content:
This crafting station can turn trash
into useful items,
as long as you have DIY Card recipes.

Click on the workbench to check the required materials,
then come back to me after you've made an insect net.

Look ahead! This is the Upcycling Workbench.
Pretty cool, huh? Bet you didn't see that coming!

Here's the recipe for the insect net.
Try crafting it in your Backpack first.
